org.mongodb.morphia.mapping
Class Mapper

java.lang.Object
  org.mongodb.morphia.mapping.Mapper

public class Mapper
extends Object

This is the heart of Morphia and takes care of mapping from/to POJOs/DBObjects

This class is thread-safe and keeps various "cached" data which should speed up processing.

Author:
Olafur Gauti Gudmundsson, Scott Hernandez

Field Summary
static String CLASS_NAME_FIELDNAME

Field Detail

ID_KEY

public static final String ID_KEY
The @Id field name that is stored with mongodb.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

IGNORED_FIELDNAME

public static final String IGNORED_FIELDNAME
Special name that can never be used. Used as default for some fields to indicate default state.

See Also:
Constant Field Values

getMappedClass

public MappedClass getMappedClass(Object obj)

Gets the MappedClass for the object (type). If it isn't mapped, create a new class and cache it (without validating).

getCollectionName

public String getCollectionName(Object object)

updateKeyInfo

public void updateKeyInfo(Object entity,
                          DBObject dbObj,
                          EntityCache cache)

Updates the @Id fields.

Parameters:
entity - The object to update
dbObj - Value to update with; null means skip

fromDBObject

public <T> T fromDBObject(Class<T> entityClass,
                          DBObject dbObject,
                          EntityCache cache)
Converts a DBObject back to a type-safe java object (POJO)

Parameters:
entityClass - The type to return, or use; can be overridden by the @see Mapper.CLASS_NAME_FIELDNAME in the DBObject

toMongoObject

public Object toMongoObject(MappedField mf,
                            MappedClass mc,
                            Object value)

Converts a java object to a mongo-compatible object (possibly a DBObject for complex mappings). Very similar to toDBObject(java.lang.Object)

Used (mainly) by query/update operations

getId

public Object getId(Object entity)

public <T> Key<T> getKey(T entity)

getKey

public <T> Key<T> getKey(T entity,
                         String collection)

toDBObject

public DBObject toDBObject(Object entity)
Converts an entity (POJO) to a DBObject; A special field will be added to keep track of the class: CLASS_NAME_FIELDNAME

Parameters:
entity - The POJO

toDBObject

public DBObject toDBObject(Object entity,
                           Map<Object,DBObject> involvedObjects)

Converts an entity (POJO) to a DBObject (for use with low-level driver); A special field will be added to keep track of the class: CLASS_NAME_FIELDNAME

Parameters:
entity - The POJO
involvedObjects - A Map of (already converted) POJOs
